name: KannadaMatrimonyÂ® - Trusted choice of Kannadigas
description: The exciting new and official android App for KannadaMatrimony is finally here!  KannadaMatrimony is a part of and is pioneered by BharatMatrimony  the worlds largest and most trusted matrimony portal. Our global network has helped thousands of Kannada brides and grooms find their perfect life partner. We are featured in the Limca Book of World Records for highest number of documented marriages online.  How different is the App from the website? No different, except that you can carry your partner search with you on your phone. And a whole range of exciting features that will make you fall in love with our App before you fall in love with your perfect match.  Take a look at what makes us stand apart from the rest of the Kannada matchmaking App crowd.   Registration of your profile can be done within the App.  Sign up using Facebook too.  Search, filter, view, and shortlist Kannadiga brides/grooms using different search options.  Search profiles by Matri ID.  View photos and phone numbers of members you are interested in.  Get real-time notifications and stay connected with prospects anytime, anywhere.  Chat, send interests and personal messages and get to know your matches better.  GPS-enabled City Search feature lets you find matches closer to your location.  Your privacy is important to us as much as it is important to you. You can trust us with your information anytime! Our App doesnt take up a lot of space on your phone. The KannadaMatrimony App is smart and light!  Over the years we have helped Kannadiga members find matches from across different Kannada-speaking communities such as Lingayat, Gowda, Brahmin - Smartha, Vokkaliga, Brahmin - Madhwa, Kuruba, SC, Adi Karnataka, Bunt (Shetty), and Devanga.  We have also helped Kannada members find their matches from relevant community matrimony apps such as LingayatMatrimony, 40PlusMatrimony, AnycasteMatrimony, BrahminMatrimony, BuddhistMatrimony, ChristianMatrimony, DivorceeMatrimony, JainMatrimony, MuslimMatrimony, VishwakarmaMatrimony, etc.  Looking to search for a bride/groom based on Religion? We have matches from all religions including Hindu, Christian, Muslim, Christian Catholic, Christian Protestant, Jain Digambar, Muslim Sunni, Buddhist, Inter Religion, and Muslim Shia.  Globally, we are the preferred NRI matrimony service provider for aspiring brides and grooms to find their perfect partner, especially for NRI communities spread over United States of America, United Arab Emirates, UK Australia, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, Oman, Canada, and Qatar.  Our top registrations come from States namely Karnataka, Maharashtra, Tamil Nadu, Andhra Pradesh, California, Kerala, Texas, New Jersey, New York, and Delhi and from cities namely Hyderabad Bangalore, Mysore, Mumbai, Dakshin Kannada, Belgaum, Dharwad, Davangere, Gulbarga, Shimoga, and Bellary.  There are also profiles from different professions/occupations such as Software Professional, Executive, Manager, Engineer - Non IT, Technician, Supervisors, Accounts/Finance Professional, Officer, Professor / Lecturer, and Administrative Professional.  With such a large database of profiles and advanced search criteria, you are sure to find the most perfect life partner.  BharatMatrimony has been conferred with numerous national and international awards for its pioneering spirit, vision, and continuous growth through its path-breaking and innovative excellence. Some of such accolades include:   One of the 100 Most Innovative Companies Globally as recognized by Red Herring  Most Trusted Online Matrimony award by The Brand Trust Report  NDTV-Hindu Lifestyle Award for the Best Community Matrimony Website  Ranked twice in Top 50 Fastest Growing Tech Companies in India by Deloitte  The Most Visited Matrimony Portal in the World by Comscore.  Your privacy is a top priority for us at all times, so feel safe. We are a 100% secure app for shaadi.   Download today for FREE and discover your life partner on the go!
